messages.content:
I didn't see this coming. For 50 years, I was a proud member of the Labour Party as an MP and campaigner.

But now I've joined the Liberal Democrats.

It wasn't an easy decision to make - I'm leaving behind friends in the Labour Party and it hurts. But it's the right choice. I can't stay in a party that has abandoned so many of its core values.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats have been consistent on Europe.
The Liberal Democrats have been consistent on civil liberties.
The Liberal Democrats are the voice of sanity and reason on key issues such as globalisation and climate change.

issues.brexitEurope: The Liberal Democrats have been consistent on Europe, just as they were in their opposition to the war in Iraq and on civil liberties.
issues.environment: From Europe to globalisation and climate change, the Lib Dems are the voice of sanity and reason.

leaflet.personalStatement:
I didn't see this coming. For 50 years, I was a proud member of the Labour Party as an MP and campaigner.

But now I've joined the Liberal Democrats.

It wasn't an easy decision to make - I'm leaving behind friends in the Labour Party and it hurts. But it's the right choice. I can't stay in a party that has abandoned so many of its core values.
leaflet.additionalNotes: PS This election could change Britain for generations - vote for a better future and use your vote to back the Liberal Democrats.
